text: Ashton Kutcher and wife Mila Kunis are ` ` Bachelor'' superfans. ` ` GMA'' / ABC The INSIDER Summary : Ashton Kutcher said on ABC's ` ` GMA'' that he's ` ` so happy'' that ABC is moving forward with ` ` Bachelor in Paradise'' after the scandal. The actor and his wife, Mila Kunis, are ` ` Bachelor'' superfans and they're dedicated to only watching the show with each other. Kutcher makes the keen observation that few people eat on the ` ` Bachelor'' shows. Ashton Kutcher is relieved that ABC's ` ` Bachelor in Paradise'' will be returning this summer. ` ` Oh man, oh man, I'm so happy '
